title: Strega Nonna (K)
creator_credit: Gene Deitch and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Animated version of a traditional Calabrian tale, retold and illustrated by Tomi de Paola about Strega Nonna the Italian Grandmother witch who cures headaches, secures husbands and banishes warts. Among her magic secrets is the trick of summoning pasta from her enchanted pot. Suitable for primary school level.
